casebody.data:
2001-3318 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE ex rel. John BASS v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 2001-KH-3318. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Bass, John-Plaintiff; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court Div. E, No. 297-008; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2001-K-1595.

Denied. La.C.Cr.P. art. 930.8; State ex rel. Glover v. State, 93-2330 (La.9/5/95), 660 So.2d 1189; La.C.Cr.P. art. 930.3; State ex rel. Melinie v. State, 93-1380 (La.1/12/96), 665 So.2d 1172.
